title: A question that I wish for an answer , discuss opened.

replies.msg:
I’m a person who sometimes overthink , put too much care on how and what other people think of me .

Unstable temper , little things make me happy , sad things make me cry. And I sometimes wonder that has everything actually been destined .

Can we create our own fate , or has our fate been created since we’re here , since a very long time ago , since the moment we were born , the moment we were still sitting quietly and peacefully in our mother’s ...

The world is interesting , almost everything is . You missed a plane caused by an accident , probably your dog ate up your carpet , but not for a long time the news reported an accident of plane-crash that you could have been on , is this just luck , or is it because in your fate there never existed in your scene , your pre-determined scene .

On the other hand , someone could have taken the later flight but instead they picked the earlier one for some reasons and they suffered .

What explains this? Just being unlucky , or is it the word fate again ?

So , the question today is , can we change our fate , our destiny , or are we simply destined . If the latter is true , what’s the point of doing anything now ?

Is this world similar to sim city ? Instead of this time we are not the one who’s controlling . Instead we are controlled by someone , something , could be God ,or he has sett us some limitation and let us control ourself but only within the range.

Sorry for the poor English , cause typing Chinese would causes a lot more trouble .
